definition: to cover; by implication, to veil, to encase, protect

translations.bg: да покривам; по подразбиране, да забулвам, да обгръщам, да защитавам
translations.da: at dække; underforstået at sløre, indhylle, beskytte
translations.el: να καλύπτω, να καλύπτω, να περιβάλλω, να προστατεύω
translations.fi: peittää, peittää, peittää, peittää, suojata, suojella
translations.fr: couvrir ; par implication, voiler, envelopper, protéger
translations.id: untuk menutupi; dengan implikasi, untuk menutupi, membungkus, melindungi
translations.it: coprire; per implicazione, velare, racchiudere, proteggere
translations.ja: を覆う；暗に、ベールをかける、包む、保護する
translations.nb: å dekke til; underforstått, å tilsløre, å omslutte, beskytte
translations.pl: przykrywać; w domyśle zasłaniać, otaczać, chronić
translations.pt: cobrir; por implicação, velar, envolver, proteger
translations.ro: a acoperi; implicit, a acoperi, a înveli, a proteja
translations.sv: att täcka; underförstått, att slöja, att hölja, skydda
translations.tr: örtmek; ima yoluyla, peçelemek, kaplamak, korumak
translations.zh: 覆盖；暗指遮蔽、包裹、保护
